data.message: I have been contacted 2 times about winning the sweepstakes is it true?

replies.message: Thanks for checking in, Steve. This is a hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1NVUkB4. -Jordan
The help center doesn't really let me report private messages from a possible scammer.
I took screen shots of the person claiming to be a director of lotto or something. Part of their profile and private messages.
Beasley Elizabeth is the profile name but said during private messages the name was Jordan.
I received a message from a Melissa Strong who stated she worked for Facebook Headquarters and said I been selected to receive 550,000.00 dollars. Then phished for info.

Thanks for the question, Velvet. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -Adriana

Ok  I will share this too . To let my friend know this .

Thanks for your information .

Facebook I was contacted by a Brown Heather Lauren saying she worked for FB as a Facebook Online Customer Service  Rep. and worked for Sheryl Sandberg. She told me she had some good news about my Facebook account. I have blocked her because her last message does not make sense to me. And her name is very suspecious. Is she for real or not ?

Hey Robert, this sounds like a hoax We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/22FCzfC. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kate
My husband got a message saying he won too and they want him to send $250 to cover check delivery fees
